QuickEdit.description:
The QuickEditDataTable class extends the DataTable class to provide
Quick Edit mode.
QuickEdit.name: QuickEdit

YAHOO.widget.QuickEditDataTable.name: YAHOO.widget.QuickEditDataTable

params.name: aColumnDefs
params.description: Array of object literal Column definitions.

constructors.description:
The QuickEditDataTable class extends the DataTable class to provide
Quick Edit mode.

_getElementStatus.description: Return the status of the field.

params.name: type
params.description: message type: error, warn, success, info

params.name: scroll
params.description: If false, does not scroll, even if this is the first message to display.

displayMessage.description:
Display a message for a quick edit field.  If an existing message with
a higher precedence is already visible, it will not be replaced.

clearMessages.description: Clear all validation messages in quick edit mode.

return.description: array if all validation passed, false otherwise

getQuickEditChanges.description:
Return the changed values.  For each row, an object is created
with only the changed values.  The object keys are the column keys.

textQuickEditFormatter.description:
Called with exactly the same arguments as any other cell
formatter, this function displays an input field.

startQuickEdit.description:
Switch to Quick Edit mode.  Columns that have quickEdit defined will
be editable.

_quickEditCopyDown.description: Copy value from first cell to all other cells in the column.

readonlyLinkQuickEditFormatter.description:
Called with exactly the same arguments as any other cell
formatter, this function displays an email address without the
anchor tag.  Use this as the column's qeFormatter if the column
should not be editable in Quick Edit mode.

copyDownFormatter.description:
Called with exactly the same arguments as a normal cell
formatter, this function inserts a "Copy down" button if the
cell is in the first row of the DataTable.  Call this at the end
of your QuickEdit formatter.

_moveFocus.description: Shift the focus up/down within a column.

params.name: cssClass
params.description: Extra class to apply to the row.

return.description: true if all validation checks pass

cancelQuickEdit.description:
Switch out of Quick Edit mode.  THIS DISCARDS ALL DATA!  If you
want to save the data, call getQuickEditChanges() BEFORE calling
this function.

return.description: true if all validation checks pass

YAHOO.widget.QuickEditDataTable.description:
The QuickEditDataTable class extends the DataTable class to provide
Quick Edit mode.

YAHOO.widget.DataTable.name: YAHOO.widget.DataTable
YAHOO.widget.DataTable.description:
Quick Edit extension to YUI 2 DataTable
Author: lindalj@yahoo-inc.com / John Lindal
